divs: Sighting DetailsI want to know if any one ells saw this. I did not see this but my friend did. He called me and was very nervus. And he is one of the most salt of the earth people I know. He dose not make thing up. What can I do to help him come to grips about what he saw? THank you Laura
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There were no other sightings in St Louis on or around September 1st 2009
